resources.string:
"Uses facial recognition, please keep in mind the following notes:
1. Your mobile phone may be unlocked by the person or item that is similar to you.
2. Facial recognition is lower than the fingerprint, pattern password, digital cipher and self defined alphanumeric code.
3. In the dark, light and backlighting conditions, facial recognition to unlock the success rate will decrease.
"

"In order to better use of facial recognition, please note the following:\n1. Enrolling stage, avoid dark light, strong light and backlighting environment, to ensure that the input face image clarity. \n2. After the enrolling is successful, the phone can be unlocked through the facial recognition when the screen is turning on."
When opened, you need to blink your eyes when unlock with Face ID, to make sure that you are yourself rather than photos or other objects
Not support enrollment in split-screen mode
